ai-iti88:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti88:2.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three inner stains, inner foes, inner enemies, inner killers, and inner adversaries.
ai-iti88:2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by three?
ai-iti88:2.6_0: These three are inner stains, inner foes, inner enemies, inner killers, and inner adversaries.”
ai-iti88:4.1_0: A greedy person doesn’t know the good.
ai-iti88:4.2_0: A greedy person doesn’t see the truth.
ai-iti88:4.3_0: When a person is beset by hate,
ai-iti88:5.1_0: Those who have given up greed,
ai-iti88:5.2_0: don’t get greedy even when provoked.
ai-iti88:5.4_0: like a drop from a lotus-leaf.
ai-iti88:7.1_0: A hateful person doesn’t know the good.
ai-iti88:7.2_0: A hateful person doesn’t see the truth.
ai-iti88:7.3_0: When a person is beset by hate,
ai-iti88:8.1_0: Those who have given up hate,
ai-iti88:8.2_0: don’t get angry even when provoked.
ai-iti88:8.4_0: like a palm-leaf from its stem.
ai-iti88:10.1_0: A deluded person doesn’t know the good.
ai-iti88:10.2_0: A deluded person doesn’t see the truth.
ai-iti88:10.3_0: When a person is beset by hate,
ai-iti88:11.1_0: Those who have given up delusion,
ai-iti88:11.2_0: don’t get deluded even when provoked.
ai-iti88:11.4_0: as the rising sun the dark.”
ai-iti88:12.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
